item.title: 562 how to find interface text
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

how do i find the id? I know the syntax is

player.getActionSender().sendString(“Bank Of DragonScape”, 762, 32);

762 benig the interface and 32 being the text id, but how do i find the other txt id’s…

Read full topic
